analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokensForSale.sub(tokensSold)) (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol)
	- token.transferOwnership(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- crowdsaleFinished (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol)

Crowdsale.purchase (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(msg.sender,amount) (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol)

Crowdsale.withdraw (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokensForSale.sub(tokensSold)) (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol)

Crowdsale.beneficiary should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol)
Crowdsale.tokensForSale should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol)
Token.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol#315-317)
Token.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol#311-314)
Token.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x1de2bfa2dfbca3af3848bfd9089ff84f447366f4.sol#314-315)
